revisions.rev:
'''Empowerment''' forms an [[apogee]] of many a system of [[self-realisation]] or [[identity]]. Realising the [[solipsism | solipsistic]] impracticality of everyone [[anarchy | anarchistically]] attempting to exercise [[power (sociology) | power]] over everyone else, the empowerment [[guru | advocates]] offer the attractions of power, but constrain its application to potentiality and feel-good uses within the [[individual]] [[psyche]].
This word has a tendency to be used as a [[buzzword]].
